description:
An elite agent working for the major PMC AAA Defender Co. She is the daughter of her PMC`s president. At work she is earnest, strict, caring of subordinates, and takes good care of people so many admire her. She was senior to Shuu back when he worked at AAA, and also is his ex-girlfriend. She still worries about Shuu even after he went independent.
Source: Official page
name: Yuugiri Ayano
